Name: Escape From Planet Aelea
About the game: Astronaut Dr. Jennifer Sousa wakes up one day in her quarters on planet Aelea outpost 3 to find that the systems are down and she has to figure out what happened. Play as lone astronaut Jennifer Sousa and follow the directions of a mysterious voice on the radio, Crain, who has the knowledge to help you get off planet Aelea! Avoid Deadly Robots - Use stealth to sneak around deadly robots that gone rogue and will kill humans on sight! Solve Puzzles - Solve puzzles to get through the bases and get to mission control! Collect Access Keys - Collect all the emergency access keys from all the other bases and activate the emergency rocket to escape! Do you have what it takes to survive planet Aelea?
